title: Unable to resize client
body:
I'm trying to play League again but I just can't seem to fit the client right. Whenever I'm in game I'm not able to move the mouse outside the screen, so I can't click and drag the borders. Even if I do manage to get out, I'm still not able to. I've tried windowed mode on every resolution. Is there a way to resize the client?
EDIT: I use a mac and an extra screen if that helps

replies.body:
Can you try using League in Fullscreen or Borderless mode and set your extra screen as your [primary display](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202351)?

Let me know if either resolved this.
